reviewText: Great video for the preschooler who wants to practice dancing at home, and great for parents who might not have a dance studio nearby! My daughter loves it and is making good progress through the classes.

I've bought "your first real Dance Class No. 1, No. 2 and No. 3-
and have also payed the tax for Germany and shipping.
All the three DVD's are absolutly idendity - and there is no difference
between no. 1 and no. 2 and no. 3 - the context is always the same.!!!
I can' t believe it. So No. 2 and No. 3  can I throw away.
It's probably a mistake in producing ???
I'am very disapointed.... wasted so much money !!!
This class is fun and easy to follow.  My daughter can't wait for her daily 'dance class' to begin.  Tanya and Louis McKay share their obvious LOVE of teaching with their young students.
